title: Occator on Ceres' Limb
description: This image of the limb of dwarf planet Ceres shows a section of the northern hemisphere. Prominently featured is Occator Crater, home of Ceres' intriguing brightest areas.
theme:
LIFELESS. Desert lands — if you value still
and silent beauty of the cosmos
